website_summaries.verdict: The best high-quality microphone available with a 3.5mm jack for home recording.
pros: Large condenser microphone offers better sound pickup than most other budget options
Comes with a complete set of microphone mount and windscreen
cons: The included pop filter does not reduce the unnecessary sounds and artifacts as well as more professional options

customer_reviews.title: Ordered on a drunken wim, impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I ordered this drunk one evening when it was on sale. When it came in the mail, i was pretty interested in setting it up and after playing with volume settings, I am actually pretty impressed. Crisp, Clear and at a good volume I have zero complaints across all VOIP platforms and games alike. Very easy to set up, hardest part was trying to find a good spot on my desk for the boom arm. For the price point, I find this setup to be a steal. Great quality and sound, I am pleased with my drunken self making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best value ever. It sounds perfect and clear with no background noise
customer_reviews.author: Nick V.

customer_reviews.title: Microphone works, but......
customer_reviews.text: Does Not include ALL that is pictured. It DID NOT include the USB adapter. I bought one at a local stereo shop. BUT.... it still doesn't push enough power to be recorder, even after increasing all of my INPUT Settings to the MAX. But, it seems to be a great value. You will need other equipment for great quality recordings.
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific beginner's package
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific beginner's package for anyone interested in doing audio work, podcasts, or recording and doing voice over on videos. It comes with everything you need to get started. The microphone is surprisingly high quality for its price. While it won't compete with high end microphones, it is excellent for beginners. All around a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: TDenmark

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I got this for the stand which works great. The pop filter would be better if the mesh was a bit more dense but oh well. The mic is decent but not anywhere near studio quality. But considering the price it makes sense. If you’re looking for a mic, audio technical is a great place to start. But if you just want something decent, remember to have a phantom power supply for this. I recommend the Behringer Uphoria m-2.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Bean

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service !
customer_reviews.text: This is my older review Great price. Easy set up. My 7.1 channel sound usb works inefficiently so now i have to figure out how to record without and annoying beeping static sound. Other than that it works but it's not going to work well for everyone unfortunately. I have a brand new mac book pro so I was shocked that this happened. This is the update so that's the old review but the seller contacted me and sent a while new channel usb free of charge which included shipping. They worked very closely and responded very quickly to me and heloed out a lot. There are few sellers who do this and I am greatful and 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vanity allure

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointed....now very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I had a issue with this but the manufacturer contacted me to remedy the issue I had with the product. I am very happy to say they were concerned with the issue I had and took care of it. The product does work great. Have had no issues. I use it to stream games and don't use a headset. This doesn't even pick up any other noise then my voice. It is very close to my speakers also. My friends/viewers had said that I sound a lot better now. For the price you can't beat this. I am now considering more of Tonor's products. Thanks for reaching out and taking care of another customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Static.
customer_reviews.text: ***EDIT*** They reached out and gave me a full refund. So that’s great. I can’t get it to stop making this staticky buzz sound. I’ve tried EVERYTHING. I’ve even emailed the company and did everything they suggested. I have phantom power. I’ve tried Mac and PC. Ive tried noise cancellation inside of GarageBand AND audacity. Nothing. I think the sound card is bad? But it makes the sound without the sound card as well so I don’t know. I’m open to any suggestions!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Hope

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: I own an AT2035 and I bought this just for anyone else who would like to join me on one of my sessions and I was surprised with how similar it sounded. The only real difference is the range it likes. This microphone is great in all aspects and is so much better than a headset mic. Would recommend to any beginner or anyone looking for a cheap upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: HAHA  people think it is expensive & super high end!!
customer_reviews.text: I held off on reviewing this because I wanted to test it out first. I got this mic because it looked good-- looked like a popular much more expensive one & had decent reviews and was well within my budget. I'm actually pretty happy with it. I included a couple pics of my set up with a little voice-over just so you can hear how it sounds & so you can see how easy it is to move it to where you need it. DO NOT JUDGE MY MESSY DESK!!!! I don't game so I can't comment on how it works with gaming but for simple voice-overs.. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pinktique

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a broken shock mount and refunded
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE EDIT: Immediately after my review, Tonor customer support contacted me to issue a full refund and allowed me to keep the microphone for free. The customer support is prompt and helpful. Mic is decent quality, but the package arrived with a broken shock mount, which means you can mount the mic onto the boom arm, so the kit as a whole is useless until I get a new shock mount. Pretty worthless as a described "podcasting kit"
customer_reviews.author: Tender Fingers

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: The arm is awkward and the mic needs to be very close to pick anything up, but it's a great set for the price. I recommend pairing it with a mixer to get that REAL studio quality though. BEHRINGER XENYX 502:  (you'll need these cables for the mixer) Hosa CMP-153 3.5 mm TRS to Dual 1/4 inch TS Stereo Breakout Cable:  XLR Male to Female Microphone Cable:
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good mic
customer_reviews.text: This mic is perfect for people that want to step up their game and have way better audio than what you get from your laptop. If you are doing reviews, podcasts or just want to record a monologue in excellent audio quality than this is a good pick. it comes everything needed to get started, I highly recommend using the USB gizmo everything just works right. I have not had any issues with it, and use it everyday. Great Mic!!
customer_reviews.author: Jehu

customer_reviews.title: Arm seems pretty cheap and not very stable
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money but nothing special, but then again it wasn't expensive so its ok. Arm seems pretty cheap and not very stable. Mic worked as advertised but quality isn't the best. But again, it was cheap so its ok for the price. UPDATE: I have been in contact with the company. the company decided to refund my money because of the issues I had. The person that contacted me was very friendly and helpful and extremely fast with her messages and responses. Refund was issued with no problems. I would buy from them again anytime because of the good experience I had after all.
customer_reviews.author: Francis W.

customer_reviews.title: Great all inclusive kit, high quality!
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Easy to assemble, took less than 10 minutes to put together. High quality sound, used with GarageBand and recording sounded very clear and crisp. Comes with detailed user manual. If encountering low sound output while recording via USB, it’s likely that you’ll need to make some adjustments to your sound configuration within your OS whether it be Mac or Windows. Mic is a perfect starter microphone for a podcast, as it comes equipped with all essentials you would need to get started. Arm rotates seamlessly for easy vertical and horizontal adjustments. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Matheny

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound quality. Great overall mic.
customer_reviews.text: I talk a lot about this mic in my video and you can hear the sound quality. Honestly the sound quality of the mic is really impressive. I am also impressed with all the accessories this comes with. It will work with the included soundcard but I suggest you use an audio interface or mixer instead. The sound for the mic is quite open. This might be the best mic I have seen at this price.
customer_reviews.author: McKay CTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Good Gear for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I did a quick video to show the difference here between the built-in mic on my laptop and the TONOR XLR version. I am using the Focusrite 2i2 audio interface. As you can hear the mic sounds very clear and is very directional. Sorry if audio is slightly out of sync, totally my fault. I would say for intro recording or a good backup mic, this device will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Been over a year and i have enjoyed it until randomly it stopped working.,
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this mic because i got tired of having issues with normal headset mics and a buddy recommended this one to me as a studio mic and in which it sounded great. I have used it for about a year fine until a couple of weeks ago when it just randomly stopped working. I checked all the settings in windows and everything was fine so i thought the mic went dead well it didn't. The cord unfavorably has went bad i have order 2 different cable in attempt to fix it and it a weird cable so im curious to see if anyone else knows where i can buy one for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I got my package today, and this set-up is fantastic! This microphone came in a well packaged box with everything organized really nice. It took me only a few minutes to put everything together and connect to my computer. (it does need it's own power source) The mic looks and feels like a premium quality product, but at a fraction of the price. The sound quality is equally as premium! I would definitely recommend this set-up for beginner or intermediate alike.
customer_reviews.author: Yazdi Bellihomji

customer_reviews.title: not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this not knowing that you needed another product to amplify the sound to your pc so once I bought the amplifier I worked but was so low you can barley hear anything wouldnt recommend unless you know how to use it and set up. If your a beginner I would recommend you buying a usb mic since those are a simple set up and dont need extra things.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is of really good quality for a great price. The sound is excellent, however i wish i wish i would have got the one with the phantom power supply, It works without it i just have to crank up the volume because the voices are low. I still give 5 stars because that is not the fault of the product. The product is exactly as described and was packaged very nicely and i am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jrmhknz1981

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't use anything else
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur gamer and wanted something to use with Discord other than a headset mic. This mic works perfectly for this, and I like that I can push the mic away on the arm stand when not in use. I originally used the USB adapter, but I think the audio quality was off, so I directly plug the mic line into the computer now. I've moved with this mic twice now, and it was easy to disassemble, repack into the original box, and then reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Still worth it
customer_reviews.text: so for the price the only cons in my opinion is definitely the base clamp if it had better grip so I could swivel my microphone without it almost comping off the desk that would be nice and second the pop filter is a pain only because the arm doesnt hold its own weight up so the pop filter will sag if you can’t find the best position for it
customer_reviews.author: Jon corona

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound. You need a Phantom Power Supply
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, but just a word of advice is that you will need a Phantom Power Supply. I got the Newer Power Supply for mine. It is easy to install and move around as needed. Just make sure to tighten the part so that they don't wiggle around. It is a great price for an awesome mic. My daughter loves it and she will be able to record her beautiful music.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: This Mic set is super affordable for it's price!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job done & sound quality sounds great! THING IS -- I don't understand why the cord get's "loose" and makes me sound robotic from time to time... maybe it's because of the app i'm using -- Makes me sound robotic? As i use other apps with it & doesn't do it at all. Overall, i recommend this affordable mic to start out with! Will upgrade later~
customer_reviews.author: ItsSimplyDomi

customer_reviews.title: Great starter mic kit!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is not some magical kit that will fix all your problems. But it DOES work. Initial setup was quick and easy. I didn’t use the pop filter because it is heavy and the best quality compared to the thinner boom arm. This is just a 3.5mm input it is not powered any other way so use an amp if you can. But I just boosted the volume in windows and added noise suppression. If you are starting a stream or podcast and are on a budget or saving lunch money... buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Power Cord Was Sold Separately
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I had ordered this and it is pretty good quality for the price. However, the power supply cord was sold separately. It's not ready to go out of the box. The company read my original review and contacted me. The refunded me for my troubles and allowed me to keep the mic. They said they are looking at options to provide the power cord so it will be ready to go out of the box. It shows they are very reliable company that stands by their product and their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The microphone and stand are great. They look and sound very professional. Studio quality, but you really need to buy a power booster for the microphone. I read the reviews and some say you need the booster some say you don't. Me I needed it, when plugged in to my laptop or my desktop the sound did not project until the power booster was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Recorded my friend's first album with the mic!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional, but I know what sounds good. I think for the $ you'd be hard to beat this mic! I had some more expensive mics but was looking for a condenser to record my friend's first album. It was a success and she loves it! I would recommend to anyone on a budget, looking for a decent mic!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal A.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mic for several months, and I'm very impressed with the quality, durability, and ease of setup. I was even able to record an entire album with it. Impressive quality for the price. WARNING: You will need either a self-powered line-in jack or a pre-amp (sold separately) to use this mic with your computer. If you aren't sure what that means then your best bet is to look for a mic with a USB input.
customer_reviews.author: ZMannZilla

customer_reviews.title: Great mic, trash everything else.
customer_reviews.text: The good: The mic is sleek looking and has great audio fidelity. It's plug and play and sets up with very little hassle. The cons: The cheap plastic, glue, and hope that holds the casing where the scissor lever plugs into the anchor snaps when you try to tighten the scissor into place. I guess for 25 bucks I couldn't justify more than 2 driblets of hot glue to pray this crap sticks together. Overall, good mic but if you're counting on the scissor and stand to be of much use, you have to specifically build with it in mind because it's inflexible and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon D.

customer_reviews.title: buy if you wanted to be disappointed (edit)
customer_reviews.text: 9/13/18 Update: same quality as before, possibly the power supply. 9/10/18 Update on Review: Seller reached out and is sending a replacement stand to try. Will update after we try it out! Garbage super flimsy, garbage quality audio, phantom power supply only made it worse, my pc also did not recognize it at all. garbage
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect mix of 'get what you pay for' and 'im kind of surprised it all works'. Sounds better than i thought it would. Cable had some hum to it. Get a better cable and its just fine. I use it for scratch vocals and room mic for drums.
customer_reviews.author: Tomagain

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: To get this to work, you always need an adapter for power. Other than that, I easily installed it on my desk. I love that the mic was blue! It made the set up stand out. It's not heavy which is a plus. You can easily pack it back to it's box!
customer_reviews.author: saleh M.

customer_reviews.title: How to use it?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this microphone from a YouTube video on how to start YouTube videos and I am completely lost I am trying to record from my phone but for voice using the microphone and don’t see how that is possible at all the mic is affordable but as far as using it with the sound card it’s completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sharnae Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Low priced, streaming microphone kit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional style microphone that is perfectly set up for streaming. The shock mount and arm feel solid. The sound quality seems high, though that can have a lot to do with your sound card as well. Overall, I'm pleased with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel T.

customer_reviews.title: Literally using superglue to attach load bearing components - Mic is okay though
customer_reviews.text: The mic is fine, no complaints there - but if you wanted JUST a mic, you probably would have chosen this. My issue is with the adjustable arm that comes with it. If you look closely at the image, you can see the clamp, and then a section that the arm itself slots into in the clamp. Can you guess how the piece that holds the arm is attached to the clamp? Superglue. I'm dead serious. It's a shame too, because the arm itself seems fine enough, but now it's a worthless piece of junk without the clamp to hold it to something.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Cox

customer_reviews.title: High amount of static when used with game capture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my game capture. Not sure what why but when you play back the recording the microphone comes back as more static than voice and basically made the videos unusable. Worked fine with another microphone so I am not sure why this one doesnt seem to want to record clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mic for the price
customer_reviews.text: First off I've never had a microphone like this before so I cant compare it to any other ones. But I absolutely love this microphone it's very nice. Sound quality during streaming is amazing. Never had a complaint during my stream. The only thing I would ask for would be a volume and echo knob on it. Other that that it is amazing and I would definitely buy another one
customer_reviews.author: David h.

customer_reviews.title: I caught believe how good this microphobe sound with no audio interface I hooked ...
customer_reviews.text: I caught believe how good this microphobe sound with no audio interface I hooked it up straight to the 3.5 input back on my son's computer and it works great i can imagine how it would sound going through a interface I recommend these to any one that s on a budget you can't beat it for the price it comes with everything you need to use out of the box!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Broderick bryant

customer_reviews.title: don't listen to the video review that slammed the USB converter because it honestly worked great with mine
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I thought I was having a lot of errors with it at first but it helped me discover my laptops mic was messed up, don't listen to the video review that slammed the USB converter because it honestly worked great with mine. I use it with the InnoGear 1- Channel 48V phantom power supply. With some audio modifications I can say without a doubt it rivals my old Yeti. I will definitely be buying a second one of these mics soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great value for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely for those long into greeting started with podcast or let’s play. Really decent quality you get what you paid for. Some of the stuff is kinda plasticky but aside during that it’s a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Torres

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Will Need Phantom Power.
customer_reviews.text: This works great, Be warned that you will probably need more than what comes in the box. Unless you can get the USB dongle that comes with it to work, which I could not, this mic will need phantom power. Then, depending on your set up, you might need additional XLR cords to meet your needs. Just make sure you have done adequate planning before you jump in and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: theMonarch

customer_reviews.title: You are Paying EXACTLY for What you GET..
customer_reviews.text: This was an OK mircrophone, but terribly Built...mine feel apart in less than a month, and the sound coming from it stopped as well...looks beautiful when you open it it..But i was disappointed at how long it lasted, and trying to reach customer service to resolve issue was horrible
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Fly-Host of The Beautiful Butterfly Show

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTIVE product description
customer_reviews.text: The add/description is deceptive in that it does not inform you that you will need an additional component ($21) to make it all work. As an experienced audiophile I had assumed the phantom power supply usually required was built in because no mention was made of needing to get one. From an experienced company like TONOR this is inexcusable. Of course, it could be that their distributor is, in fact, responsible. I ordered the external power supply necessary, but the delay was quite costly in an unforeseen production delay. "Buyer beware!"
customer_reviews.author: Bob & Susan Shelton

customer_reviews.title: No USB sound card
customer_reviews.text: Just so everyone knows, in the video it shows that it comes with a small USB sound card but it does not actually come with it. In case that was a selling point for you like it was for me 😔
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Can’t connect to laptop without adapter sold separately!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Now I see “needs adapter sold separately “ for laptop. Wouldn’t it be less of a hassle to make that unmistakably clear? How about an alert “WAIT YOU Need more stuff!!!” Certainly amazon could prompt to verify you already have the equipment not included. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: GENUINE JUNK, but great seller.
customer_reviews.text: MIKE WORKS BUT ADJUSTABLE STAND IS A CHEAP TOY! DIDNT USE PROMPTLY AFTER i GOT IT OR i WOULD ASK TO RETURN IT. BEEN TOO LONG NOW. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY! IN ALL FAIRNESS, THE PROVIDED A REFUND LONG AFTER SALE!. ITHEY ALSO STATED THEY ARE IMPROVING THE PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service!  A++
customer_reviews.text: Microphone boom broke within 10 minutes of setting it up, however Tonor customer service was fantastic. They were more than happy to send out a whole new kit, with an better scissor boom. Communication was stellar and pain free. Fantastic customer service! A++
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mic doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mic to record audio for videos and to have better mic quality for video games. I bought the package without the xlr power supply since i have a desktop and it said it would work with just connecting to the desktop. I got the boom arm and pop filter set up and the microphone put in the shock mount and... nothing. No noise at all. Even tapping the microphone with my finger didnt produce any noise. I ran troubleshoot and updated my drivers and still nothing works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mic for getting started!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing but good things to say about this mic. Setup wasn't too complicated and the sound quality is great. I'm toying with starting a podcast and needed one of these to really correct the sound.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Litteral garbage. It fell apart while unboxing it. The usb port was in 5 peices. The mount does not work. Never got it to record any audio because the connection to the pc was so bad.
customer_reviews.author: DnD

customer_reviews.title: Mics good, USB is Achilles heal.
customer_reviews.text: I just spent two days trying to figure out why these decently reviews mics sounded like totally effing garbage. Then I bypassed the USB adapter and plugged directly into my phone and it sound pretty damn decent. THESE USB ADAPTERS ARE HORRENDOUS. I really can't even describe how poor they make the audio. They shouldn't include them in the setup, it's just a waste. Don't be like me, spend the extra few bucks for good adapters and don't waste your time and energy. Even on a shoestring budget, its worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Mic for a Cheap Price
customer_reviews.text: Dont get me wrong. It WORKS it just isnt as high quality as I'd hoped. If you need somthing that works go for it but if you have high hopes of stellar AQ just save the money and buy a Yeti
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Mic for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for ways to improve on advertising for my photography company so I wanted to start doing Live videos but wanted a mic for cheap that would do the job. This one definitely does the job cant beat it for the price does exactly what you meed it to. I'd recommend getting an audio mixer with phantom power to improve on the quality. It's one more thing to buy but with the price of this and a simple four channel audio mixer you're still saving money because it would still cost you more just for some of these other mics.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo R

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Great customer service: fixed my issue
customer_reviews.text: The bracket snapped of days after installing it. It’s held together with a glue strip kind of like a command hook.i got one use out of it before it fell apart. I am updating my review. The company reached out to me offering a full refund as they state this is not a frequent occurrence. I must have gotten a one off mid manufactured one.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Wind Background Noise!?
customer_reviews.text: Original Rating:The Mic Quality Is Decent But The One Thing I Dont Like Is The Stand.The Stand Is Terrible It Left Marks On My Desk And It Wiggles Too Much Edit: The Customer Service is Awesome They Sent me Another Mic With Everything So Yeah Customer Service Is Awesome Edit From October 14 2017 The Mic Now Makes A Weird Background Noise It Sounds Like Wind So I Have To Lower My Mic Volume And Get Rid Of The Background Noise In Audacity!Plus I Dont Think Its The Mic But My Mic Picks Up Desktop Audio
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy stand
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the microphone, but the stand is so cheap and flimsy. I cannot even attach it to my desk securely because the metal starts bending before it is tight enough not to slide off. Look for something better or be prepared to replace the stand. Update August 22nd. They sent me a replacement stand after seeing my review above. It has a heavier duty bracket, which is made out of thicker metal, so it works a lot better. Unfortunately, it is not the bracket that comes with the microphone, so my original review still stands. Maybe if you write a bad review, they will send you a bracket that doesn't bend.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic
customer_reviews.text: This thing has better than the more expensive the sound quality is perfect. It wasn't a "yeah it kinda sounds like me" it is dead on sound
customer_reviews.author: Jonah Bragg

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap, what else would you expect?
customer_reviews.text: Arm snapped within seconds of it being mounted, even when it was standing, it made the worst noise when adjusted, and the cable for the mic is done for. I don't know that the mic itself even works anymore. But you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Mic...hey mic
customer_reviews.text: Roses are red violets are blue. The mic that's pictured is that way too. It mounts to the table for total ease of use. Sound quality is great and less money from you.
customer_reviews.author: Preacher

customer_reviews.title: Wow, what a deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge bundle deal! It doesn't just come with a microphone. It comes with everything you need for desktop mic. The microphone has really great quality, both recording quality and overall hardware quality. It is very sturdy and professional. Highly recommend anyone interested in audio recording, get this bundle!
customer_reviews.author: Jerremy

customer_reviews.title: Good budget microphone! Excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: Microphone itself seems to be of really nice quality. Seems to be much more clear than anything else I've ever used. Although I might have gotten a bad scissor arm the first time, their customer support was really nice about sending in replacement one (this one is working perfectly fine now). I would say it's a great buy and would definitely recommend it, especially since it includes this much for a mere 30 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect addition to my desk
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this is great. Convenient and out of the way on my desk. So glad I finally got this. The perfect addition to my desk
customer_reviews.author: Neolantis

customer_reviews.title: Thought was a great price, only to find out that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very misleading. Thought was a great price, only to find out that it is not complete. It needs phantom powering it up otherwise it has no volume(lost an extra star for that alone) Yelling into it barely registered anything - with or without the additional usb adapter. Should not be advertised otherwise. With a power unit- it is an ok mic. Price reflects quality. It works but it is cheaply made. Feels like something could break anytime I do simple adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Laddie

customer_reviews.title: More than great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Is it top-quality for voice over actors? Maybe not but it's a great place to start. More than adequate for gamers, vloggers, etc. Nice rich sound but don't forget a pre-amp since it needs its own power. I bought one for the same price at the TONOR mic itself and I've no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: R. Larochelle

customer_reviews.title: For the price Im very pleased with this one the only reason why it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I Have tried about 4 different microphones Before I got this one. For the price Im very pleased with this one the only reason why it doesn't get 5 stars is the arm that it attaches too is a little flimsy but other then that it works great. NO FEED BACK......
customer_reviews.author: Erick Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Great Mic kit for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this mic, it has no noticeable noise paired with a UM2 audio interface, I like the inclusion of a pop filter and a windscreen. I only gave it 4 stars because of 1 thing, on the desk, the bolt holding the arm on underneath has a ball mechanism toclamp onto wonky surfaces, this will bend out when clamped onto a straight surface, wish this was a little more sturdy. Other than that, great buy. One thing to note is you will need phantom power though, otherwise it will be much too quiet.
customer_reviews.author: nodogpoo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality microphone and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is better quality than another one I got. It was easy to put together it took me maybe 5 minutes. The manual was very clear on how to put it together but I couldn’t find instructions on how to install it on the computer but the computer itself tells you how. I really liked that you could maneuver it and it grips very well to the table. It’s perfect for recording a video or singing.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in October 2018. Has been stationary ever since. Use every day with no issues then power went out and doesn't work. Return/refund request closed. It is now February 10, 2019, only 4 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Penny

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Microphone is great for the price! Very clear and sounds great after a little bit of editing in audacity. Out of the box I noticed that it was a little quiet when I used the included microphone and headphone to USB adapter. For some reason it put my microphone level down to 0 and I’m not sure if it is my computer but if anyone is having their microphone very quiet that is most likely the reason. Goes great with my setup and is a lot better than my headset mic I used before.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Jorda

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Setup was manageable, quality is amazing people online say I am crystal clear, can be annoying to position at times but for the most part it is perfect for most people will want it for. Not looking to spend thousands on a audio setup then this mic is just what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use the given cable
customer_reviews.text: The microphone has a problem when being used in discord, Skype, and teamspeak where it will cut out completely when in game or when using a recording software. This may be due to the 3 prong to aux cable that comes with the mic. The stands mount will bend if overtightened.
customer_reviews.author: Payton S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly ~ works great
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is pretty good for the price ~ not amazing. Great for young youtubers and gamers just getting started.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Bach

customer_reviews.title: JUST A GREAT MIC
customer_reviews.text: I was wonderfully satisfied with the quality of this mic and the great sound is gives. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Danzil Monk

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your Time
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't work and I didn’t get any help from anyone to help. Don’t water your time.
customer_reviews.author: Taliah

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: I use it when recording, speaking during video games, or just chatting with people online. Works like a charm. Better than my camera's built in microphone and my headphone's built in microphone!
customer_reviews.author: Arther

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended... Great sound quality... nothing bad at all...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality condenser microphone... can use on cellphone or tablet without phantom power, and on pc too but for better sound on PC, I'll recommend 48v phantom power...
customer_reviews.author: Steinmanlee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am a total beginner and this headset was a great start! Came with all I needed to hook it up to my laptop and the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Graham

customer_reviews.title: The mic itself sounds great for the cost - but the boom is absolute ...
customer_reviews.text: The microphone sounds absolutely great given the price point. I'm very happy with the quality of materials used (again, given the price point, it's a huge surprise as to how durable this thing is). Also, I initially had an issue with the boom stand when it first arrived, but TONOR was absolutely lovely to work with, and made it right immediately. All around a pleasant experience.
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: All decent except the mic
customer_reviews.text: The mic did not work at all. For the price though, it was an okay buy for all the other parts and we use the mic as decoration (ugh). Ended up buying a BLUE instead but still use the pop filter and a few other parts from this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for what you are paying. Sound quality is great! I reccomend you buy a power supply with the mic if you want full functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love this mic
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about the mic before I bought it, but I needed one for my stream & heard good things about this one. Anyways, it works & sounds great, I'd honestly recommend it to anyone, not to mention it comes with a stand and pop filter. Lastly, I'd suggest getting a 48v box with it. It's not needed, seeing as how the mic can draw power from the pc, but I found that it makes it sound quite a bit better. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: loved how easy it is to set up. The USB converter makes it so much easier to share mic abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Get the power supply...
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for budget streamers. Definately get the phantom power supply otherwise you will need a soundcard, and also there is some static/humming without power supply. I am having an issue where even when I am talking directly into the microphone, the audio cuts out or is extremely low sometimes. IDK if it is an issue with cable or microphone but it is frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. The microphone doesn't work well at all. It doesn't work consistently. When it works, it is very quiet and not clear. I contacted the company with my concerns when we bought it wondering if perhaps we had a faulty one. My son just reminded me that we still have not had any response from them. Unfortunately we can no longer return it. Extremely disappointing experience!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: it looks cool but it isnt sensitive enough. you have to be toooo close to use it and once you upload it the volume is still lower than all other posts on youtube or a podcast service
customer_reviews.author: Theadore

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level combo kit for streaming or voice recording
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level combo kit for streaming or voice recording. Paired with the BEHRINGER U-PHORIA UMC204HD audio interface. First day I used it as an in game mic for CSGO and got lots of compliments about my mic sounding great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Well..
customer_reviews.text: Impressive.. I got this when it was on sale and when it came.. I love the quality. The microphone is clear and crisp. It works well with my iPhone and I don’t even use the phantom power supply. The volume is great..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Really good sound quality for the price. I'm reviving my voice over career after a few decades. I had a small budget. So, I gambled on this and wow! I'm totally happy with the results when I recorded my demos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is it a good starter mic for beginners?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a used mic and the mic came without instructions and without all the parts. I think if all of the parts came with it, it might be a good mic but now people can't hear me when I speak unless I yell and it is not fun to try to setup and figure out without instructions. I would not buy this product used, I would buy it new if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Microphone is great but....
customer_reviews.text: The microphone, the pop filter and the stand itself is excellent. The USB adapter that comes with the microphone is absolute junk. The adapter starts crackling after 10 seconds of recording. After spending $6.00 and getting a new USB adapter it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: On some applications I had to boost my voice to max and on others I'm already on a good sound level
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the Tonor for gaming / talking in game / teamspeak and discord and it works incredibly well as I have it mounted on the edge of my desk hovering over my mouse by a foot and a half, I and all my friends have zero problems with it. I'm using the USB plug in and it still sounds very clear and loud. On some applications I had to boost my voice to max and on others I'm already on a good sound level. For the price I'm satisfied and it helps that the aesthetics of the mic are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Paulo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this microphone works really really well. I strongly I recommend getting a mixing board that has an onboard fire button to power the microphone. You can get an external power supply for it but it's better when it's run straight through a board. I'm really love this mic it works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Yhamish

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for youtubers
customer_reviews.text: Uselful for someone who want to record some audio clips or so , but didnt work that well for gaming , and the support team is very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Ameena alfares

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy & amazing qualitity
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for something simple and cheap and to say the last I'm very pleased! The only thing i'm having trouble with is the loose pop filter. It falls quite often almost like it's too heavy? It's probably just a simple mistake I made but none the less I'm very pleased regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Quite grainy/noisy like static, also very metallicy of a voice
customer_reviews.text: Quite grainy/noisy like static, also very metallicy of a voice, but still use the arm and spit pop guard with my other microphone. so it wasn't a complete waste, I would recommend spending the extra $20 dollars tho to but a better microphone because this one is not good in any capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great condenser microphone
customer_reviews.text: Great condenser microphone. Sounds great. You need to get an audio interface to get the most out of this. Needs 48V phantom power. Just get an audio interface and you shouldn't have any problems. The XLR cord it comes with is pretty much useless. So just buy a male to female xlr cord on Amazon with an audio interface and you should be good. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Eric & Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for at least a year of two and it sound great and works great, only thing is over time the pop filter loses some strength, but that’s not hard to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good...could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and tried it on many computers and it would not work. I ended up adding a SYBA sound adapter to a prime now order to have one more attempt and it worked great! Pretty good sound considering the price point. There's some minor, but all in all it's going to it's job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dunham

product_meta.title: TONOR XLR Condenser Microphone Kit with XLR to XLR Cable/3.5mm to XLR/Adjustable Mic Suspension Scissor Arm/Shock Mount/USB Audio Adapter for Professional Studio/Home Recording, Podcasting, Black
feature_bullets: ♪♫Note: 48V phantom power is not INCLUDED!(The condenser microphones require an external source of power like 48V phantom power.)/ It CANNOT be used with mobile phone and tablet computer. For a better sound quality, pls face the sound source directly onto the screened sides with logo of the microphone head.

♪♫All-in-one: Package includes a microphone, shock mount, adjustable suspension scissor arm stand, table mounting clamp, pop filter, windscreen, 3.5mm XLR cable, XLR male to female cable, a sound card and manual.

♪♫Cardioid Polar Pattern: Cardioid polar pattern reduces pickup of sounds from the sides, improving isolation of desired sound source, which is ideal for podcasting, streaming, youtube video and also can be used for recordings at home or professional studio.

♪♫How to Connect: If your laptop doesn't have audio input port, you need to connect the phantom power to the laptop via a sound card. If you need to connect it into the mixer device, you need to connect the microphone to the mixer device via the XLR male to female cable.
♪♫Great Gift: The microphone is a great gift idea for your kids or friends who like to play games, record videos, voice over, etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,360 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
